title: Derrick James
text: I'm a senior full-stack software engineer passionate about helping individuals and organizations leverage technology to achieve their desired objectives.
subtitle: MY RECENT PROJECTS

home_items.name: CareerPrepped
home_items.description: Online talent development solution for the career education community which creates a global, competency-based talent community where soft skills are continuously developed and claims for both soft and hard skills are proven.

home_items.name: Army's Baby Closet
home_items.description: Army's Baby Closet is a sample eCommerce application for a baby clothes retailer.

home_items.name: Crown Clothing
home_items.description: Crown Clothing is a sample eCommerce application built for a Turkish clothing manufacturer (Bebus) to demonstrate that there are better ways of building usable experiences which are targeted for business growth.
